creator: sharif2

title: Pocket Lists
content:
I have just discovered Pocket now allows you to sort Pocket Saves into Lists. !! Hurrah and thank you so much.

However, it would be SO HELPFUL if it was possible to sort the Lists alphabetically, as I now have so many it is difficult to find a particular List.

I realise this may be a development, but just thought I would check.

Also - I am not sure many people have realised you have added this ability to Pocket, so maybe you could advertise it more. I beleive a lot of people would prefer to use Firefox for saving Collections instead of other providers, but it was so confusing to use it before you added this capability. Thank you
creator: geneann

title: Extensión para mejorar el manejo de la FindBar / Add-on to improve FindBar management
content:
Hace años usaba una Extensión de Firefox que mejoraba el manejo de la FindBar. Por ejemplo, podía hacer cosas como que apareciera arriba de la pantalla y no abajo, o que pulsando Ctrl+F por segunda vez la barra volviera a ocultarse. Pero ahora ya no encuentro esa extensión. ¿Hay alguna forma de conseguir al menos que la FindBar aparezca en la parte superior de la pantalla?...

Years ago I used a Firefox Add-on that improved the management of the FindBar. For example, it could do things like making it appear at the top of the screen instead of the bottom, or pressing Ctrl+F a second time would make the bar hide again. But now I can't find that extension anymore. Is there any way to at least get the FindBar to appear at the top of the screen?...
creator: pacorramos

title: Firefox sees my Windows 11 laptop as a mobile device, and some websites don't work properly
content: I have been using Firefox since I cannot even remember when. I never had a problem with Windows 10, but since I got a Windows 11 Dell laptop a couple of years ago I have been unable to use some websites. This one in particular: french.typeit.org. It allows me to write in French, with French accents and some special characters and letters that do not exist in an English keyboard. Always worked flawlessly with FF on Windows 10, but with Windows 11, I am able to write in English, but when I hit a French character nothing happens. I tried disabling all extensions, deleted history, etc., in vain. I contacted the app developer, and after a back and forth exchange with him he determined Firefox sees my laptop as a mobile device, and that is why his app will not work. He said he thought there was nothing I could do on my end, so FF needs to do something. I use this app with the Brave and Edge browsers with no problems at all, but I would much prefer to use FF if I can. Thank you.
creator: ffellag

title: Google pages (Gmail, YouTube, etc.) won't load if I am using VPN (PIA)
content:
I am using Firefox with the uBlock Origin and Cookie AutoDelete extensions enabled. When I try and load Gmail or any other Google site, I get a blank page and nothing loads at all. This only occurs when my VPN is on (I use Private Internet Access). However, even with the VPN on, Chrome will still load those sites. Disabling the VPN means that the sites load normally.

My guess is it might be some sort of privacy setting in Firefox, but I don't understand what it could be. The only thing that breaks/fixes the sites is connecting and disconnecting the VPN, irrespective of which country I try and connect from.

title: won't load new pages
content:
About once a day, my latest Firefox x64 (under latest Win x64) stops being able to load content in new tabs. Content in existing tabs continues working. I usually have 15-50 tabs open, but I haven't been able to connect the problem to any particular action/state in/on my Firefox instance. My Chrome (which I also always have open) doesn't have this problem. My PC's internet access, in general, continues to function normally, i.e. I haven't been able to detect any other problems which "happen at the same time." My cybersecurity tools include (paid) Kaspersky Internet Security, (paid) MBAM, and a SentinelOne agent.

This problem started happening maybe 3mo ago, and has continued across several Firefox updates (and several Patch Tuesdays / Windows restarts).

Restarting Firefox always solves this problem (until the problem next recurs), so it's not, you know, catastrophic, but it seems like it might be something you want to know / do something about.

Let me know if/when/what further diagnostic information I could provide.
creator: crates100

title: Copy-And-Paste From One Firefox / Waterfox Browser To Another WITH Link Names
content:
I have a question about the same topic of this older thread here -

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1257189

...when you do some of the solutions to this problem the copy-and-paste from either the vertical column or in Bookmarks manager it will copy the whole URL code as the title of the link and not what you renamed that link or its default name from its creator.

Is there a way to copy-and-paste the bookmarks WITH the already-created link names attached from the previous Firefox / Waterfox browser?
creator: SennaSempre

title: html5 poor sound quality with rattling noises
content: Hi. Currntly I'm using 123.0b9 (64 bit) beta FF on W10 and I have this undefined problem with sound when use firefox (problem has start about two months back)- until today I couldnt find the way to make it sound correct with no rattling in the background. Situation occurs when watching any youtube videos od listining some live audio stream (probobly html5 audio in both cases). I was looking for some answers and find out that there was some simillar html5 sound rattling problem already solved some time ago- but this solution does not work for me (I have try to make some settings "false" in "about:config"). I have also try to manually disabled all the extensions and to run firefox in the "problem solving mode" - both with no luck. The solusion for me was to enable "Use hardware acceleration when available" - but I already disable it for a reason - scroll and other extra mouse functions works only when this function is disable... Now i finally have the good sound quality without scrolling or poor sound and scroll - but not both. I hope we can fix this somehow
creator: cekin86
